title: Dragon platelegs (g)

properties.name: description
properties.value: The dragon platelegs (g) are dragon platelegs with a dragon legs/skirt ornament kit attached to it, and is a part of Dragon gold-trimmed armour. The attached ornament kit gives no additional bonuses, and is only used to add aesthetics to the platelegs. It costs 187,924 for both the parts to make the dragon platelegs (g).

The dragon platelegs (g) are dragon platelegs with a dragon legs/skirt ornament kit attached to it, and is a part of Dragon gold-trimmed armour. The attached ornament kit gives no additional bonuses, and is only used to add aesthetics to the platelegs. It costs 187,924 for both the parts to make the dragon platelegs (g).

While the platelegs are untradeable in its ornamented state, it can be dismantled anytime, returning the tradeable platelegs and ornament kit.

[[File:Dragon platelegs (g) detail.png|left|90px]]
The '''dragon platelegs (g)''' are [[dragon platelegs]] with a [[dragon legs/skirt ornament kit]] attached to it, and is a part of [[Dragon gold-trimmed armour]]. The attached ornament kit gives no additional bonuses, and is only used to add aesthetics to the platelegs. It costs {{Coins|{{GEP|Dragon platelegs}}+{{GEP|Dragon legs/skirt ornament kit}}}} for both the parts to make the dragon platelegs (g).

While the platelegs are untradeable in its ornamented state, it can be dismantled anytime, returning the tradeable platelegs and ornament kit.
